name: To See The Light
description:
To See The Light is about jumping, and jumping, and jumping, and collecting more gems, really, its that simple.

Features:

GREEN BACKGROUND

Side scroll running

Jumping

High score based play

Controls:

Click to jump

R to restart

I'm Tei and I deleted my entire project with all the assets by accident four days before the deadline so here it is, a self inflicted 72 hours game jam results and an insult to the game dev community.

For whatever reason, you can contact me through: xodudwkd00@gmail.com
